name: FirePiggyFree
description:
Free version for FirePiggy.

Fire Piggy – Touch inside the green circle to spawn a new bullet to fire the piggy. Please be very careful in some advanced levels. Do not collide with the ground, wall, board, gear and neon light. Good luck!

Game instructions:
- Do not waste bullets, they are limited.
- Hit the stars to get high score.
- There are 50 levels to go, so do not waste any more time and get started.

Features and hint:
1. Different levels, 50 unique maps.
2. Easy to play with fun.
3. Need more time, get more time in shop.
4. Get more bullets in shop.
5. Game Center supported.
